div.p: Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxvj die februarij anno Dominj et cetera lxxvijo /

quo die
ta vxor henrici bawne amerciatur pro iniusta empcione farine ante horam statutam et p
precij fori prout compertum fuit per assisam

Die quarta mensis marcij anno quo supra / coram preposito ballivis et consulibus Andreas b
inuenit Dauid colison' plegium legalem pro eo quod Alexander huchonson erit indempnis
de eo aliter quam Jura volunt Et alexander trail deuenit plegius pro dicto alexandro ut supra

In curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem vjto die marcij anno
Domini et cetera lxxvijo / Actio plegij prosecuta per magnum Wormot contra et aduersus Johannem
Wormot submittitur ad cum consensu parcium ad amicabilem composicionem istorum subscriptorum videlicet
Dauid colison thome fif et gilberti Waus' electorum pro parte dicti Johannis Wormot
et Roberti blindsele Alexandri rede et Jacobi cumming electorum per dictum magnum
Wormot pro se et parte sua / que quidam persone sunt iurate ad fideliter decidendum et
determinandum dictam actionem secundum noticiam et scienciam eorundem / et dicte partes sunt iurate
ad standum determinacioni eorundem / et ista determinacio fiet facta die lune proximo futuro
ante merediem

Eodem die in curia Johannes scherar carnifex burgensis huius burgi deuenit debitor pro
Johanne scherar' manente in edinburgo ad satisfaciendum et fideliter persoluendum
Edwardo portar de xxiiij s' sibi debitis per dictum Johannem commorans in edinburgo
infra hinc et festum penthicostes proximo futuro

Item eodem die Andreas branch dedit Dauid mathoson plegium legalem pro eo
quod lindesay herraldus erit indempnis aliter quam Juris ordo exigit et requirit
Et Robertus blindsele deuenit plegius pro dicto lindesay herraldo de indempnitate
dicti Andree modo et forma predictis

The ix dai of marche the yer' of god et cetera lxxvij yeris Alexander of chawmer aldirman
alexander menyes Johne of mar Johne of Knollis Johne Wode Dauid colisone
Robert of culan Dauid symson Robert blindsel alexander howison Alexander rede
James cuming William blindsel yungar gilbert of chawmer thomas chawmer John'
Wormot gilbert the Waus' thomas prat alexander mar adam of crafurd thom of
mar' alexander trail androw branche and William more . has grantit and promittit for
finance tobe made til my lorde the coadiutour ten lastis of salmond ffor the quhilkis
tobe gottin thai haf consentit that thai be stentit and taxt wpon the persons that has the
watteris and occupiis the fischingis of this burgh et cetera

Curia legalis ballivorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio die ixo predicto marcij anno quo supra / quo die
secte vocate et curia affirmata et cetera

Eodem die Robertus de Kyntor primo die vocatus ad sectam Andree naghty pro iniusta de
tencione vnius firlote grossi salis Non comparuit / quare precipitur sergeando et cetera

Item eodem die Willelmus de Kyntor vocatus tanquam primo die responsurus plegio porrecto per Willelmum
more pro iniusta detencione vnius barelle salmonum ad bonum compotum Non comparuit et cetera

The xj dai of marche the yer' et cetera lxxvij yeris comperit in the tolbuthe before Robert
blindsel ane of the bailleis Johne of Wellis duelland in leith the quhilk consti
tute and ordanit huchon of Wellis his brothir german his procuratour actour factour'
and speciale deput to prouide and forsee for his lande liand in the greyn and tobig
it til his behufe And al vthir thingis todo vse and excerce anent the said land with the
pertinens that he mycht do gif he war bodely present / promittand tohald ferme and
stable quhatsumeuir thing his said procuratour and factour laghfully ledis tobe done
in his name before thir witness' Androw scherar Johne Wormot mawnus Wormot
and vthir diuers'

In the balye court of he burgh of Abirdene haldin in the tolbuthe the xvj dai of marche
the yer' forsaid . It wes fundin and deliuerit be ane sworne assise that Sym of
gardyn is dettour til Androw ratre of a pak of quhite claith and certane skyn
nys with the quhilk he intromettit of the said androwis that he ordanit tobe deli
uerit til Robert ovirdale / for the quhilk the said Sym wes adiugit in amercia
ment for the wrangus' halding tharof and tocontent the said androw as law wil

Item the same dai the assise deliuerit and ordand that patrik lesly sal
a paper of commpt and rekning of his lamskynis as merchand til vthir / and he is quite of his clame

Curia capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem die
penultima mensis marcij Anno Domini mo iiiijco lxxviijo quo die secte vocate et curia affir
mata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die prepositus et ballivi per wardam curie assignauerunt priori fratrum predicatorum huius
burgj diem Jouis post festum penthicostes proximo venturo ad ostendendum cartam suam de tentacione
cuiusdam terre Jacentis in vico de futy debatabil' inter venerabilem patrem Abbatem et conuentum
de Deer' ex parte vna et priorem et conuentum fratrum predicatorum predict' ex parte altera / et sic
cum consensu parcium

Item eodem die Johannes de Kyntor burgensis de Abirdene accedens ad barram protestatus
fuit pro vno annuo redditu sex solidorum et octo denariorum sibi ut asserit debit'
et a longo tempore non solut' de quadam vasta terra Jacente in futy inter terram
prioris et conuentus fratrum carmelitarum huius burgi ex parte boriali et terram Wilelmj
cryne ex parte australi Et accessit ad eandem terram et nichil reperit distringibile
pro dicto annuo redditu recuperando preter terram et lapides quos presentauit in sacculo
coram preposito et ballivis in curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Jacobo clerk
andrea atkyn burgensibus et Johanne vaus sergeando .

Iniungitur alexandro rede per prepositum et ballivos ad probandum hodie ad quindenam quod actio
plegij porrecti super eum super per Dauid howison de xj s' et iiijor d' dependet
in lege spirituali

Item eodem die Willelmus de Kyntor secundo die vocatus ad sectam Willelmi more pro detencione
ij barellarum salmonum Non comparuit

Johannes stevinson eodem die / primo die vocatus responsurus plegio per Willelmum moyses
super eundem extenso pro iniusta detencione xxxvj s' ab ipso Willelmo Non comparuit et cetera

Eodem die Robertus de Kyntor secundo die vocatus ad sectam Andree naghty
Non comparuit

Willelmus robertson adiudicatur in amerciamento pro plegio iniuste extenso super Andream
murray et Johannem stewart

Item eodem die Alexander de camera prepositus Alexander menyes andreas scherar' Johannes de mar Johannes
de Knollis David colison et Robertus blindsel electi fuerunt commissarij per communitatem ad assedandum
piscarias terras et redditus burgj ut premittitur in acto desuper fact' et cetera

Vltimo die marcij anno et cetera lxxviijo Johannes fichet coram Roberto blindsel vno ballivorum
constituit gilbertum Waus suum procuratorem ad agendum et defendendum pro eo in omnibus causis
placitis et querelis / ipsum qualitercumque tangens promittens de Rato cum ceteris procuratoriis
clausulis necessariis testibus henrico thome philippo de Dunbrek et diuersis aliis

Curia ballivorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem tercio die mensis aprilis
anno quo supra /

quo die Alexander mar' faber adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento pro iniusta capcione
et detencione nami sui a domino andrea chavmer cappellano quem cepit pro annuo redditu
sibi debito per eundem alexandrum / et ad satisfaciendum prout Jura volunt

Eodem die compertum fuit et deliberatum per assisam quod Agnes sponsa Johannis fichet
iunioris est soluta de xx s' clamatis per ipsam a Willelmo hay pro tinctatur pannj

The same dai anent the debate betuix Dauid gethan and Johne of culan of xlij
s' g' the quhilkis the said Dauid deliuerit til him toware on saip and Irne
the assise has ordanit and decretit / that in the erast schip that beis fragh
tit fra flandris til abirdene / the said Johne sal deliuer til the said Dauid sik
gudis as he chargit him toware the said sowme on the said Dauid be
rand the aventur tharof / and failyeand tharof that he sal deliuer til him xlij s'
g' in flandris in the erast schip passing thareftir fra the said burgh to flandris

The ferd dai of the said moneth of aprile In presence of the aldirman baillies and
certane of the consale sittand in Jugement Johne stevyn is becumin ful dettour'
to free thom of schethin anent androw murray Johne stewart and maistir Adam of
gordoune of fourty eestland buyrdis and tokepe him scaithles of thaim and
of al vtheris in thare name tharof in tyme tocum

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram ballivis eiusdem xiijo die aprilis
anno quo supra / quo die secte vocate et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die comparens in Judicio Adam hervy fecit constituit et ordinavit venerabiles
viros magistros gilbertum hay de vry et Johannem hay rectorem de crowdan
coniunctim et divisim suos procuratores cum potestate substituendi vnum vel plures procuratorem
seu procuratores ad prosequendum Alexandrum rolland pro certis litteris prius ab eodem petitis
et ad faciendum ea que ad prosecucionem et recuperacionem dictarum litterarum pertinere dinoscuntur si
presens et personaliter interesset promittens se habere ratum et cetera

Item thomas gardnar' constituit Willelmum blindsel iuniorem suum procuratorem ad prosequendum Rober
tum de Kintor de sex salmonibus sibi ut asserit per eum debitis et a longo tempore inius
te detentis et ad agendum defendendum et recuperandum dictos salmones pro eo prout Jura
volunt Et promisit de Rato et cetera Similiter idem thomas constituit Agnetem suam sponsam eius procu
ratorem vna cum dicto Willelmo coniunctim et divisim ad petendum et optinendum ab Alexandro hay ix s'
et iiijor d' recuperat' ut asserit super eundem et in omnibus aliis causis et cetera

Inquisionis nomina Johannes de marr' Johannes de Knollis Johannes Wode alexander rede
gilbertus Waus thomas prat Willelmus blindsel iunior Adam de craufurd Johannes
stewart gilbertus morison Dauid hil alexander trail Dauid howison thomas fif et
Willelmus blindsel senior Qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam Donaldus skynnar' auunculus
margarete Walkar' latricis presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem
et fidem dominj nostri Regis de quodam tenemento sive terra cum pertinenciis iacente infra burgum
de abirdene in vico furcarum ex parte orientali eiusdem vici inter terram Dauid colison ex parte
australi et terram Roberti culan ex parte orientali Et quod dicta margareta est legittima
et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam Donaldi auunculi sui de dicta terra cum pertinenciis et quod est
legittime ettatis Et quod dicta terra cum pertinenciis valet nunc per annuum xiiij s' et iiijor d' libere
et tantum valuit tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgale
Et quod nunc existit in manibus Mariote skynnar relicte quondam dicti Donaldi racione
sue iuncte infeodacionis quam inde habet pro tempore vite sue a tempore obitus eiusdem quondam Donaldi qui obiit
per v annos elapsos uel eocirca

Eodem die Willelmus de tulidef gener Ade craufurd constituit in curia eundem Adam
suum procuratorem in omnibus et singulis actionibus et debatis sibi pertinentibus seu spectare
valen' promittendo se habere ratum et gratum et cetera

Item eodem die thomas scrogs primo die vocatus responsurus plegio super ipsum extenso
in manu alexandri de camera seriandi per Willelmum cadiou tanquam le sey farand man pro
iniusta detencione xj s' et vij d' de suo stipendio / non comparuit et cetera

The xvij dai of aprile the yer' of god et cetera lxxviij yeris It is statute concludit and
ordanit be the aldirman ballies and common consale that the cunnaris and taistaris of
the ail pas throu the toune ilke oulke anys and set the ail eftir as
it is of vale at the hieast til xij d' the galloune and gif it be nocht
wourth that that thai set it til viij or vj d' the gallon as thai think it of
vail / and that na ail be browyn derrer than xij d' the gallon vndir the pane
of viij s' vnforgevin at the first and second tym that thai be convict / and at
the thrid tyme gif thai be convict of the breking of the price set be the
cunnaris as said is thare lede bothum sal be strikin oute and the forfautaris
salbe bannyst fra brewyn for a yer' and day And that na vnfree personis
brew quhil thai haf leve of the aldirman And that nane cum to the merket
to chape vittal meil or malt in preve or in a pert before the houre of
xij at none et cetera

Item it is statute and ordanit be the aldirman balies and common consale with the avise
of the baxtaris / that na baxtar sal bake les than xij vncis of gude brede
the peny laif and the twa penny laif thareftir of xxiiij vncis of gude stuf
and quha that beis convict of the contrare salbe put fra the craft for a yer'

Item the same dai maistir thomas the vaus chantour of murray and Elizabeth
the spous' of alexander menyes in the name and on the behalf of the saide alexander
comperit before the aldirman and balyeis in Jugement and offerit til gilbert
of chavmer thare present ix li' in redy monee for a cop pertening til the said alexander
quhilk wes lade in wed be vmquhile androw menyes / his fadir til him / And
becaus' the said gilbert wes nocht sickirly inverrit as than of the some' that
wes awand for it til him he askit delay quhil mononday next tocum that he
mycht be avisit with his buke tomak answer' tharupon

Item eodem die andreas clerk constituit hugonem Waus Donald' pyot in canonia Aberdonensis
et thomam badenagh suos procuratores coniunctim et divisim ad prosequendum Willelmum quelp ad conseruare
faciendum ipsum constituen' indempnem de plegiagio quod subijt alexandro de camera preposito pro eodem
de vj marcis vel ad ipsum remouere faciendum de terra quam nunc inhabitat et eandem vacuam di
mittendum ad festum pentecostes proximo futoro promittens se habere ratum et cetera

Die xixno aprilis anno et cetera lxxviijo coram preposito et Roberto blindsele vno ballivorum accedens
in pretorio Johannes baxtar proponens se nauigaturis / ex certis causis racionabilibus ipsum monentibus
dedit et assignavit Eufamie de panton' sponse sue carissime omnia et singula
bona sua mobilia casu quo ipsum contingat discedere quod absit in suo viagio
ad huiusmodi bona ipsius eufamie proprio vsui applicando et de eisdem disponendo ad
sue libitum voluntatis coram hiis testibus Willelmo blindsele iuniore andrea culan andrea
Kymdy Dauid marr' et Duncano stralogh sergeando cum diuersis aliis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xxmo die aprilis
anno predicto /

quo die actio plegij porrecti per Dauid howison aduersus alexandrum rede
de xj s' iiijor d' propter absenciam eiusdem Alexandri existentis in canonia et excusati pro ne
gociis suis ibidem Repectuatur per ballivos cum consensu partis vsque crastinum in statu quo nunc

Eodem die thomas chapman fecit et ordinavit Johannem chapman iuniorem ipsius fratrem
suum procuratorem ad videndum probaciones perduci per Johannem chapman seniorem eciam dicti
constitutis fratrem penes quandam obligacionem petitam per ipsum Johannem seniorem et in omnibus aliis
causis ipsum tangentibus Et promisit de Rato de Judicio cisti et iudicato solui et cetera
Willelmus burges pistor amerciatur pro foristallacione burgi emendo frumentum in patria vt reperitur per assisam

Eodem die Willelmus club pistor ex concessione propria amerciatur pro iniusta empcione fru
menti extra burgum

Quedam mulier vocata marioria amerciatur pro vendicione ceruisie xij d' ordinat' per
gustatores propinari pro viij d'

De actione mota inter Johannem andree et patricium coupar ita determinatum est per assisam
quod idem patricius debet dicto Johanni x s' sive vnam togam et j hamburgh barellam / et si velit
acquietare se per iuramentum de residuo clamei sui erit quitus Et prefatus Johannes
reperitur in debito dicti patricij de iij s' pro firma domus et in amerciamento pro perturbio eiusdem

The xxij dai of Aprile the yer' of god et cetera lxxviij yeris Anent certane lettres of
our soueran lord the kingis direct to the aldirman balyeis consale and communite of abirdene
schawne and opinly red in presence of thaim than beand gadderit in the tolbuthe
makand mencion of certane ambassat of his hienes tobe send to the duke and
duches of burgunye and ostrage for the gude of merchandice and renouacion
of al priuilegis grantit til the merchandis passing to brugis in flandris and in thaa partis
And for certane commissionaris of this burgh tobe send til his hienes be the
ferd day of maij nixt tocum with ful power' toconclude apon the passage of
the said ambassat furnist with expens' for thare part of the sammyn ambassat as
in our soueran lordis lettres mare fullely is contenit ffor the quhilkis the aldirman
ballies consale and communite forsaid has consentit and ordanit that certane commissiona
ris be direct tharwpon and taxis tobe made and rasit as sic like burrow
is of the Realme dois for the said caus'

Die xxvta mensis aprilis predicti Alexander howison deuenit plegius legalis pro Jacobo de
Kintor quod Nicolaus baxtar erit indempnis de eo aliter quam Jura volunt Et dictus
Nicholas inuenit Willelmum blindsele seniorem plegium pro eo de indempnitate prefati Jacobi ut supra

the same dai the ballies chargit William sprunt and Wil club baxtaris to desist fra
baking for a yer' becaus' of breking of the pas' ordanit tharwpon of before in
the quhilk it was sene and fundin be the balyeis and consale that thai gretly trespassit
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xv die mensis maij anno supradicto /

quo die Willelmus blindsele
iunior prosecutus fuit per plegium thomam de Kynnard de iniusta detencione octo celdra
rum ordij precium celdre octo marcas et viij s' Similiter peciit ab eodem quinque libras xij s'
et xj d' vsualis monete Vnde dictus thomas petens auisare / ipso auisato peciit diem lega
lem ad respondendum Et prepositus et ballivi assignaverunt eidem ex decreto curie hodie ad quindecim
dies et pro introitu ipsius thome dicto xvto die et recessu eiusdem prout Jura
volunt patricius badenach deuenit plegius

The same dai thomas symson has fundin Alexander menyes thomas fif Johne
the vaus and William blindsel yungar borowis for him be the wphal
ding of thare handis tokepe the aldirman balyeis consale and this toune scath
les anent our soueran lord the king and his consale in sa fer as thai haf grantit
til obserue the command of our soueran lordis lettres direct til the aldirman and balyes
of abirdene for to keip and defend the said thomas symson and Jonet fichet his spous'
in the peceable Joising and brouking of certane landis croftis and annuale rentis
assignit to the said Jonet be William fichet hir fadir as scho allegis like
as the copy of the samyn lettres vndirwritin proportis / and agane stude and de
nyit the peticione and desire of the partie contrar' William fichet and his
forspekaris anent the ministracion of Justice nochtwithstanding our souerane
lordis lettres present and direct to the aldirman and balyeis forsaidis tharwpon

James be the grace of god king of scottis Til the aldirman and ballies of our burgh of
abirdene greting ffor samekil as it is menyt til ws be Jonet the spous' of
our louit thomas symson burges of our said burgh . that quhare scho has bene in pece
able possession of certan landis croftis and annual rentis lyand within and besyde
our said burgh thir xxviij yeris bigane / gevin and assignit to hir be William
fichet hir fadir / Dauid crukschank wrangwisely vexis and distrublis hir
and hir said spous' in the Joising and brouking of the saidis landis croftis and annuel rentis
be a pretendit alienacion maid to him be the said William in contrar' al ordour
of law and iustice / and in gret scath and hindring to thaim Oure wil is herfor and
we charge you straitly and commandis that ye kepe manteine supple and de
fend the said Jonet and thomas hir spous' in the peceable Joising and brou
king of the sadis landis croftis and annual rentis like as thai haf done in
tymes bigane Sa that throu that pretendit alienacion thai be nocht hurt in
thare possession And gif that the said Dauid or ony vthiris persons has ony
action or clame to thaim anent the sadis landis croftis and annualis / that thai
mak thaim lauchfully be callit before ws and our consale And we sal mak
Justice be deuly ministret to thaim tharin as efferis And that ye ministre Justice to
the said Jonet and hir spous' in the sammyn action eftir the forme of the lawis of
burgh sa deuly that we here na rychtwis' complaint tharupon in tym tocum As ye
wil answer to ws and vndir al pane and charge that eftir may folou Nocht
withstanding ony lettres or chargis of owris gevin or tobe gevin to you in
the contrar' deliuering thir our lettres be you deuly execut and indorsit agane to
the berare / gevin vndir our signet at Striuelyne the xiiij day of maij
And of our Regne' the xvij yer'
Per S d n Regem de majestato speciali
James R:
Scheuez

James be the grace of god king of Scottis Til the aldirman and balyeis of our burgh
of Abirdene greting ffor samekle as it is hevily menyt and complenyit til ws
be our liege William fischet burges of our said burgh that quhar' he had xx schillingis
worth of land lying within the sammyn Jonet fichet his dochtir and thomas symson
hir spous' wrangusly and aganis the law as he allegis Intromittis with the said
land and has intromittit tharwith of lang tym bigane / he being vtouth our Realme in
his pilgrimage in great scaith and hindring to the said William And in contrar' of law
and Justice Oure wil is heirfor and we charge you straitly and commandis that ye
incontinent eftir the sicht or thir our lettres in our name cal before you bath the said
William Jonet and thomas . and that ye eftir thare richtis writingis and documentis
tobe schewne and producit before you that ye deuly ministre Justice to the said
William and his partij Sa that we here na rychtwis' complaint tharupon in tym cumming As
ye wil ansuer' to ws and vndir al pane and charge that eftir may folou deliuer
ing thir our lettres be you deuly execut and indorsit agane to the berar' gevin
vndir our signet at Edinburgh the xiij day of Aprile And of our Regne' the xviij yer'
Ex deliberacione dominorum consilij

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xxiijo die mensis
maij anno Dominj mo iiijco lxxviijo

quo die Ricardus hil prosecutus fuit per plegium
Andream scot manentem in Kairnbulg de iniusta detencione xviij bollarum et
dimidii ordij et duarum bollarum farine ab ipso ricardo tamquam plegio pro Johanne
fresal de pettowly / vnde Idem andreas per alexandrum meignes prolocutorem suum peciit
diem legalem ad respondendum dicto plegio / et assignatum fuit eidem hodie ad quindenam / quj
quidem andreas inuenit Alexandrum menyes plegium pro eo ad comparendum et respondendum dicto die prout Jura
volunt / et deficien' introitu ipsius prefatus alexander deuenit plegius et debitor pro summa

the xxvij day of maij / mally cristy and elspat sanchar ilkane in amerciament for strublans
of vthir And becaus' the said mally excedit scho sal be put in the gofe and bannyst / gif it
be fundin that scho trespass' in like wise in tym tocum as the assise has ordanit

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxixo die mensis maij supradicti subscripti electi fuerunt
in assisam videlicet Johannes de mar' alexander rede thomas de camera Dauid mathoson Johannes
malisson magnus Wormot thomas scrogis Duncanus byrs thomas prat Willelmus andree
Walterus aghneif henricus thome Ranaldus talyour Walterus thome / qui Jurati ma
tureque auisati inuenerunt et deliberarunt / quod Dauid crukschank iniuste intromisit
cum certis litteris thome symson captis per ipsum ab alexandro cowtis vnde adiudicatur in amerciamento
et ad restituendum huiusmodi litteras prefato thome prout Jura volunt

Eodem die actio plegij prosecuta per Willelmum blindsele iuniorem aduersus thomam de
Kynnard cum consensu partis prosequentis et patricij badenach plegij dicti thome ponitur
in dilacione vsque ad diem lune videlicet primum diem Junij proximo futuro in eodem statu et
forma quibus nunc existit absque preiudicio parcium

Item eodem die coram preposito et ballivis in curia Thomas symson constituit thomam fif
Dauid meignes et gilbertum vaus coniunctim et divisim suos procuratores ad prosequendum
et defendendum terras crofta et possessiones quascumque dicto constituen' et Jonete fichet sponse
sue pertinen' et in omnibus aliis causis placitis aut debatis sibi qualitercumque concernentibus Et promisit
de Rato / de Judicio sisti et Judicato soluj et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem primo die
mensis Junij Anno Domini et cetera lxxviijo /

quo die patricius badenach plegius pro thoma
de Kynnard sepe vocatus ad intrandum eundem in curia coram balliuis tanquam primo
die ad sectam Willelmi blindsele iunioris pro iniusta detencione octo celdrarum ordij precium
celdre viij marcas et viij s' et pro quinque libris xij s' et xj d' vsualis monete Non intrauit
dictum thomam / quare precipitur seriando ad capiendum districtum de dicto plegio et cetera et ad summonendum ipsum ad intrare faciendum
prefatum thomam hodie ad quindenam tanquam secundo die huius processus Et incontinen' Duncanus straloch seriendus
capiebat districtum a dicto patricio et liberavit eundem ad plegium ipsum premuniendo ad intrare faciendum dictum thomam
vt supra / testibus andrea Kymdy Johanne colison et Dauid howison cum aliis

The same dai the aldirman and consale has ordanit and deliuerit / that al persons that has
Com togrynd within this burgh sal grynd thare corn equiualently amang
al the mylnys pertening til this burgh / and specialy Androw ramsay quhilk is a
makar' of malt / And quha that beis convict doand in the contrar' sal pay ane
vnlaw of viij s' vnforgevin / And gif the said androw ramsay dois in the contrar' he
salbe excludit fra his craft within this burgh

Die quarta mensis Junij predicti Dauid meignes et Willelmus blindsel senior ipsorum quilibet deuenit
plegius legalis pro altero per extensione manuum suarum philippo de Dunbrek seriendo quod Wil
lelmus fichet et Dauid crukschank erunt indempnes pro eis aliter quam per viam Juris
Et dicti Willelmus fichet et Dauid crukschank dederunt gilbertum de camera plegium
legalem / quod dicti David menyes et Willelmus blindsele senior necnon Dauid mar' Willelmus
blindsele iunior et Willelmus quelp erunt indempnes pro eis aliter quam Jura volunt

Similiter Dauid marr' inuenit Dauid menyes plegium legalem pro eo / et idem David mar' plegius
pro Willelmo blindsele iuniore Et gilbertus morison plegius pro Willelmo quelp / quod Willelmus
fichet et Dauid crukschank erunt indempnes pro eis aliter quam per viam Juris

Item patricius badenach deuenit plegius legalis pro Willelmo de Keith filio et herede
apparenti gilberti Keith de Inuerugy militis et pro Alano Kynnard de eodem
Et Andreas scherar' plegius legalis pro gilberto skene de eodem quod David
menyes et Willelmus blindsele senior erunt indempnes pro eis aliter quam Jus requirit
Presentibus ad inuencionem dictorum plegiorum Alexandro de camera preposito Jacobo cumming vno
ballivorum Johanne de mar' Dauid colison alexandro rede David mathoson Adam bachi
ler' nuncio dominj regis et domino Roberto leis notario publico cum multis aliis

Eodem die gilbertus morison deuenit plegius legalis pro alexandro sanchar' de indempnitate Willelmi
fichet et Dauid crukschank pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris
